name: Atomic Habits
description: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones by James Clear.

name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a Kiss
description: A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life by Mark Manson.

name: Educated: A Memoir
description: A Memoir by Tara Westover detailing her life growing up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho.

name: Sapiens
description: A Brief History of Humankind by Yuval Noah Harari.

name: Becoming
description: The memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama.

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
description: A mystery novel by Delia Owens, set in the marshes of North Carolina.

name: The Alchemist
description: A novel by Paulo Coelho about a young shepherd on a journey to find his personal destiny.

name: The Midnight Library
description: A novel by Matt Haig about choices, regrets, and infinite possibilities.
A dystopian novel by George Orwell that explores themes of government surveillance and totalitarianism.

name: The Power of Now
description: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment by Eckhart Tolle, exploring the power of living in the present moment.
